title: Amazon CloudFront to AWS Lambda URLs
description: This pattern creates an Amazon CloudFront distribution on front of an AWS Lambda function URL.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern deploys an Amazon Cloudfront distribution, an AWS Lambda function URL. The function logs the incoming event and context object to an Amazon CloudWatch Logs log group and returns basic information about the event to the caller.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.headline: Presented by Daniele Frasca
authors.name: Daniele Frasca
authors.bio: I am Daniele Frasca serverless enthusiast. I build and architect serverless applications at scale.
